values: Serial/chalk Leaders will walk each of their groups to their assigned waiting area and remain there until instructed to move to the Bird.
No one will walk around the PZ without a Senior leader escorting them around in order to prevent accidents.
Serial/Chalk leader escorts and designated/marked areas for their lift.

Leaders will get instruction and directly communicated the exact path and attitude to enter the bird.
Path will be universal and no one will be allowed to use alternative paths with the helicopters having active propellers.

Crew inspections, listen to instructions, stay away from broken helicopters.

draw.overall_supervision_plan: RSO and OIC will orient soldiers to the training area before each event. Serial/Chalk Leaders will be identified and be responsible for training and controlling their element on the PZ. Each Serial/Chalk Leader will rehearse PZ/LZ operations before execution to reduce confusion and increase understanding of the order of movement on the PZ/LZ. Each platoon will conduct STX operations in support of each other during the training and will return in reverse order back to exfil from the objective.
